title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 624.2 - Termination by training facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 624.2 - Termination by training facility

State Regulations
A trainee who is terminated by the training facility from

State or Federal vocational training, because he has failed without good cause
to maintain satisfactory attendance or progress in accordance with training
facility standards, shall not receive a State training, subsistence or
transportation allowance for one year after such termination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
624.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
